headline: Katoen Natie Supports Union Pacific–Norfolk Southern Merger, Applauds Coast-to-Coast Rail Expansion
summary: HOUSTON, September 03, 2025--Katoen Natie (KTN), a global logistics and distribution company, today voiced strong support for the proposed merger between Union Pacific Railroad and Norfolk Southern Corporation, hailing it as a historic step forward for the nation’s supply chain. The merger would create America’s first coast-to-coast railroad, seamlessly connecting over 50,000 miles of track across 43 states and linking approximately 100 ports.
